alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 11:17PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Converse County through 1145 PM MDT... At 1116 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles south of Pine Tree Junction, or 32 miles southwest of Wright, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Converse County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
